name: Bruschetta
description: Grilled bread topped with tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Deep-fried wings served with a variety of sauces.

name: Edamame
description: Boiled soybeans seasoned with sea salt.

name: Fried Calamari
description: Breaded and fried squid served with marinara sauce.

name: Hummus and Pita
description: Chickpea spread served with warm pita bread.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Breaded and fried mozzarella served with marinara sauce.

name: Nachos
description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, and salsa.

name: Onion Rings
description: Beer-battered onion rings served with dipping sauce.

name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy dip made with spinach and artichokes served with tortilla chips.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Thin rice paper wrapped around vegetables and/or meat, served with dipping sauce.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled and served with steamed vegetables and rice.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: Fettuccine pasta tossed with homemade basil pesto sauce and cherry tomatoes.

name: Steak Frites
description: Grilled sirloin steak served with crispy French fries and side salad.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Succulent shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and white wine, served over linguine pasta.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Two soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomato, and shredded cheese.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Grilled chicken breast served over fettuccine pasta with creamy Alfredo sauce.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Assorted vegetables sautéed in soy sauce and served with steamed rice.

name: Spicy Sausage Penne
description: Penne pasta tossed with spicy Italian sausage, bell peppers, and tomato sauce.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender strips of beef cooked with mushrooms and onions, served over egg noodles in a creamy sauce.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Crème Brûlée
description: Traditional French Desserts of vanilla custard topped with a caramelized sugar crust.

name: Apple Pie
description: Classic American pie made with fresh apples and warm spices, served with a dollop of whipped cream.

name: Tiramisu
description: Layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Banana Split
description: Vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry ice cream served with sliced bananas, whipped cream, and chocolate sauce.

name: Lemon Tart
description: Tangy lemon curd in a buttery tart shell, topped with fresh whipped cream and berries.

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: Silky smooth chocolate mousse topped with a dollop of whipped cream and shaved chocolate.

name: Peach Cobbler
description: Warm peach filling topped with a sweet biscuit crust, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Cheesecake
description: Creamy New York-style cheesecake topped with your choice of fruit sauce or chocolate drizzle.

name: Gelato
description: Italian-style ice cream in a variety of flavors, including chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice, with your choice of cream and sweetener.

name: Hot Tea
description: A soothing and comforting cup of your favorite tea, served hot with honey and lemon if desired.

name: Margarita
description: Classic tequila-based cocktail made with lime juice and triple sec, served with salt on the rim.

name: Soda
description: Refreshing carbonated Beverages in a variety of flavors, including cola, lemon-lime, and root beer.

name: Red Wine
description: Smooth and fruity red wine, served at room temperature in a stemmed glass.

name: Orange Juice
description: Fresh-squeezed orange juice, packed with vitamin C and served chilled.

name: Beer
description: Refreshing and crisp beer in a variety of styles, including lager, ale, and stout.

name: Lemonade
description: Tart and sweet lemon-flavored drink, served over ice and garnished with a lemon wedge.

name: White Wine
description: Crisp and refreshing white wine, served chilled in a stemmed glass.

name: Milkshake
description: Creamy and indulgent milkshake in a variety of flavors, including chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry.
